name: Api\Objects\Error
description: See the properties of an error the Apple News API returned.

properties.name: code
properties.description:
An error code that, in combination with the key path, uniquely identifies the error for the specified endpoint.
Returned: Always

properties.name: keyPath
properties.description:
An array of field names that uniquely identifies a field in the JSON input of the request. See .
Returned: Sometimes

properties.name: message
properties.description:
A user-friendly, detailed explanation of the error code.
Returned: Sometimes

properties.name: status
properties.description:
A code the server issues in response to a request.
Returned: Always

properties.name: value
properties.description:
If applicable, the value supplied in the request for the field that keyPath specifies.
ReturnedSometimes
